title: New: Dirty Projectors – Dance For You
body:
Yet another indie band to receive the Twitter trend stamp of approval, **Dirty Projectors** new track _Dance For You_ deserves all the plaudits that come it’s way.

Blending one part Animal Collective with bluegrass folk inspirations, _Dance For You_ is the sound of the summer yet to arrive, the hope that maybe, just maybe, this year the sun will come out. Hell, even if it doesn’t, at least we’ve got **Dirty Projectors**.

_Dance For You_ is taken from **Dirty Projectors** upcoming LP **_Swing Lo Magellan_** – 9 July 2012 on [Domino Records](http://www.youtube.com/redirect?q=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.dominorecordco.com%2Fswinglomagellan&session_token=mRVg86-7SPaPFNPA0_05Dp9ScYF8MTMzOTg1MDQ1OEAxMzM5NzY0MDU4).
